snippet: Newsweek, which has been sold twice in the last three years, will to begin a 64-page weekly edition in January or February.
abstract: Newsweek, which has been sold twice in the last three years and ceased print publication in 2012, expects to begin 64-page weekly edition in January or February.
lead_paragraph: Newsweek, which has been sold twice in the last three years, will to begin a 64-page weekly edition in January or February.

headline.print_headline: Newsweek Plans Return To Familiar Platform
